Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates by stating that Illinois has the "most educated … workforce in the entire nation" without providing sufficient evidence or ranking.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support or evidence to back up the statement about having the most educated workforce.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that businesses want to come to Illinois because of its educated workforce, which may not be the only factor influencing business decisions.
Exist alternative explanation: The claim does not consider alternative explanations for why businesses may want to come to Illinois besides having the most educated workforce.
